entry.title: Strangers in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: unnamedmystery

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,544Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 217

Summary: When the Daily Planet heard word of a new vigilante in Crime Alley that supposedly had no affiliation with Batman, Perry White thought it to be a nice short story—a quick in and out. After all, while the people of Metropolis had Superman, everyone knew of Batman, and a vigilante not working with him seemed interesting. At least, that’s what Perry told his college intern. And her mentor Clark Kent when he raised concerns. No one told her that the vigilante was intimidatingly attractive. Or that Crime Alley was the worse place in Gotham City. Or that her mentor would ask a friend to keep tabs on her. Or that the detective she’s staying with hates Batman despite working with him frequently. Or that the detectives neighbor was a really cute guy.

entry.title: Ballerina of the Black Site
entry.summary:
Author: Twilight789

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,310Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 46

Summary: The Black Site is no place for softness. Here, young ballerinas are trained to spin, strike, and survive under the League’s watchful eyes. But when friendship becomes a liability and a single mistake can mean the end, you must decide how much of your soul your willing to lose to earn a name—and a future.

entry.title: MIDNIGHT CHRONICLES: Cursed Souls
entry.summary:
Author: strangenight (strangerlets)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,995Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 28

Summary: Strange cases begin to spread across Gotham, and not even Batman can explain what's happening. With John Constantine unable to help - and very reluctant - he ends up pointing to someone who should never have gotten involved. But as the city descends into chaos, Batman and his family learn that some monsters don't live in the shadows… they live within us.

entry.title: Marriage of Convenience
entry.summary:
Author: after_avenging_hours

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,173Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 107

Summary: Jason Todd doesn't marry for love. That whole 'white-picket-fence' life was never in the cards for him. But he will marry you, so you can have access to his health insurance. He's certainly not using it, and he'd rather not have to deal with looking for a new roommate after you die from the infection you refuse to get treatment for. It's a marriage of convenience. No fuss. No complications... at least, until he starts falling in love with his wife.

entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,107Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 422

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: Outsiders Inspired Batboys: Jason Todd x Chubby! Reader x Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,401Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. I might do two ending depending on how I feel and the direction that the story goes. Protective vibes will be in play.Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.
